website_summaries.verdict: Engine running rough? This product is rated to return your fuel injectors to nearly 100 percent efficiency in one treatment.
pros: Red Line cleans fuel injectors, carburetors, valves, and combustion chambers with a blend of high-temp and low-temp detergents
It’s designed to reduce your engine’s need for octane by up to two points, which can save you money at the pump
Contains synthetic upper cylinder lubricant and is safe for continual use on neglected vehicles
cons: As with many fuel injector cleanser, some users reported no significant difference after using this product

customer_reviews.title: Red line for my soul
customer_reviews.text: My commute is an slow slog of an hour with nonstop, bumper to bumper traffic. I drive 16 miles on the highway each way...the “speed limit 65” signs taunting me as I creep past them at 4 miles an hour as I fight my way into the city with the rest of the suburban office drones. But I live for the brief moments of acceleration, the few seconds I have before hitting the brakes and coming to a complete stop thirty feet later. This product makes those seconds marginally better...and sometimes that’s enough to get me through another day of misery and bitterness.
customer_reviews.author: Vasbinder

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Saved me a lot of $$$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a P0420 (catalytic converter) check engine light and I was quoted $1,700 dollars to get it repaired. For $15 dollars its worth trying and I DON'T regret my decision! My check engine light is no longer on and I've gone through 3 tanks of gas thus far. So far so good! Saved me a lot of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: I heard some people use only 1-2 oz (from 15oz bottle) on every tank fill up and get even better results. ~$26 for two bottles a year is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you buy gas at any other gas station than chevron or shell, this product is a must. Gas is absolutely the same at all gas stations but they have different % of detergents in it which keeps your fuel system and engine clean. Use a bottle twice a year right before changing the oil. This fuel additive has the highest % of polyetheramine detergent in it on the market. Don't bother trying other products. I heard some people use only 1-2 oz (from 15oz bottle) on every tank fill up and get even better results. ~$26 for two bottles a year is not that much money considering you could potentially save hundreds of $ later on repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Constantin Munteanu

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my p0401 & p0420 Error codes
customer_reviews.text: my f150 4.6 Was running just fine before but i was getting engine light. my code reader reported that p0401 & p0420 Error codes. After one bottle in a full tank the engine light was able to be cleared and stayed off. I cant say what the real issue was but the codes were telling me to replace the catalytic converters, o2 sensors and replace and or clean the erg valve and sensor. may have been that it cleaned up the injectors and such. it was well worth doing and very please...
customer_reviews.author: RobLen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My motorcycle is 10 years old so it has plenty of garage time. It was idling rough so I thought I would give this a try. It now idles smooth and seems to have brought it back to like new performance. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Zzman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely toxic, leaked through closed bottle and seal.
customer_reviews.text: There is something very wrong with this product's bottling. It arrived with its contents leaking through the closed seal and cap. It arrives in another sealed plastic bag, and the fumes also eats through that bag. Do not pour into engine without very strong safety gloves and some kind of safety mask. Becareful of the fumes too. I'm not sure how good the product is. Probably wasn't a good idea to put it in the engine after it leaked through all of it's protective seals. Worried about the rubber gaskets in the pistons and fuel injectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer / Must use product!
customer_reviews.text: Works, plane and simple! Used in my 2011 Porsche Cayanne Turbo and 2014 Acura RLX with absolutely no problems! After 1st bottle = 1 full tank = engine sounded and ran smoother After 2nd bottle = Split in half between 2 full tanks = Engine sounds even better and runs even smoother; FOR REAL! I have tons more bottles left and not sure I'll need them for years to come. I couldn't tell you if I get better mileage since I have done any road trips yet and I drive the Porsche like I stole it around town, so yeah, no way to know at this time. Thank you Seller! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: N+B+O

customer_reviews.title: RX-8 Tune Up
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing occasional hesitation between 4,500 - 6,000 RPM, so I purchased Redline in the hopes I could get to it faster... The redline that is. And yes, I certainly can. Whatever was going on with my fuel delivery, combustion or exhaust system has since cleared up, and I am gleefully back to full throttle without any hesitation. Will most definitely be buying this again as part of my maintenance routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my hiccups.
customer_reviews.text: Had a very rough idle in one of my vehicles that triggered my CEL. Not happy. Heard about this product and decided to give it a try. Lo and behold my idle smoothed out and the CEL disappeared. It's been about two months now and still running smooth. Based on my results, I purchased two more bottles for my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: where's waldo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chemistry at work
customer_reviews.text: Has the right stuff- polyetheramine (PEA)- which Chevron spent a fortune in R&D to create. I researched Redline and found that it has the highest concentration of PEA. Only one other brand comes close. I've been a "car guy" for 35 years. One treatment made a bigger difference than any other product I've ever tried. It is cheaper to put a bottle in my Subaru turbo at every oil change than to regularly pay for expensive brands of "engine cleaning" gas.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: It works. Replace fuel to Ethanol free and add this.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my s1000rr after lumpy running post winter with the poor overwintered fuel. Changed out to fresh fuel, nope still running lumpy. Added this red line additive and hey presto she transformed in literally 2 minutes to instant start and sharp and lively in the throttle!! Wow like new!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Newby

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: SUV is 10 yrs old has about 90K miles was getting a little sluggish. I did back to back gas fill ups using the red line and the 93 octane gas (20 gallons of gas and 1 full bottle of redline. Repeated process at next fill-up). The suv is more responsive, idles smoother, engine is quieter, and starts up like new (all improvements). I'm back on the cheap gas now with no additive and the suv is still running great. So I added it to my other suv which is newer and did not have any problems so I added it anyways just for maintenance. I'll be adding this to both of my vehicles at every oil change now.
customer_reviews.author: techluck

customer_reviews.title: I noticed idling at stop lights was getting pretty rough and my mpg were dropping into the 15's
customer_reviews.text: 98 4runner LTD 4x4 It works! I noticed idling at stop lights was getting pretty rough and my mpg were dropping into the 15's. I've used two bottles. First bottle and fill up I noticed idle getting better and mpg in the 16's. Second bottle and fill up has almost been emptied and I've noticed a big improvement! Not only has my idle almost completely smoothed out BUT I've noticed an annoying engine area tick that I used to have at startup is completely gone! I can't comment on final mpg yet, but if I had to guess I'd say I'm back in the 17's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't tell a difference and decrease my MPG
customer_reviews.text: I used this product instead of my typical BG 44k cleaner. I wanted to try something different. I don't feel that this product worked as good as the BG 44k because my gas mileage decreased in my BMW Z4. Typically with BG 44k, my gas mileage increases by 2 mpg or so but this product decreased my MPG by 2.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Red Line SI-1 Complete Fuel System Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST to TRULY keep your engine running at peak efficiency! Cleans both carbureted and fuel injected systems. I trust ALL Red Line products, I'm a LOOONG time user.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kuehner

customer_reviews.title: engine grinding knocking went away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Expeditions engine was making am awful clunking sound under load acceleration....Googling recommended an injector cleaner.... we've used redline in the past...so figured try it again... one bottle of red line helped..then on the 2nd bottle in the full tank ..gone gone gone. the clunking grinding stopped and drives like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: steelersfan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now, and buy it again for your friends later
customer_reviews.text: I get a few bottles of this stuff at least every couple months or so so that I always have it on hand for my own car and can give it to friends whose cars sound like they need it. It's AMAZING stuff. You can audibly hear and physically feel (in your feet, through the pedals) the difference it makes in your engine. Put it in your car and it'll feel like it's brand new, even at a high mileage. I use it every 20,000 miles or so. The best fuel system cleaner available.
customer_reviews.author: joshjohn77

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works pretty good it does seem to smooth out the idol on my wifes 2002 eclipse the car only has 70,000 miles on it and probably needs injectors cleaned or replaced ,but this stuff does smooth the idol out ,,for a month or so then need to add it again ,,they say add it every tank ,and when paying 4 dollars a gallon for gas ,adding another 13 dollars for a bottle of this stuff does not make for a happy day ,,,so i just use LUCAS in between and seems to work good for me so far ,,,7 dollars a bottle would be doable but not 13
customer_reviews.author: Frank O.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product to run through your tank a couple times a year
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell if it did anything or not. MPG didn’t increase, didn’t change idle characteristics. I bought it because I know it’s a good thing to run through your tank a couple of times a year. Usually if you add it after experiencing performance issues.... it’s more often than not too late. Chevron with Techron is another solid product and so too is LubroMoly or LiquiMoly Jectron.
customer_reviews.author: MRC

customer_reviews.title: Complete SI-1 Fuel System Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: No more rough idle Acceleration is like new again Dumped 2 bottles in 1/4 tank and drove it hard Refilled tank and dumped in one more bottle Mitsubishi 2.4L CVT Mpg before 34 @2000rpms Mpg after 36.5 @2000rpms
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner but don't overdo
customer_reviews.text: Feels good to put this stuff in. Highly recommend doing a half bottle to 14 gallons or full bottle to 25 gallons at first use then use 2oz (yes that little) every full tank. Works much better to do the later early on than having to super dose to clean. Can be harsh to certain catalytic/fuel systems that offer eco mode, in this case only do the 2-4oz every full tank.
customer_reviews.author: The smiley face on Amazon means A to Z -- CRAZY!

customer_reviews.title: Works great for clogged injectors
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually pretty skeptical of most injector cleaners. I found few actually clean. This cleaner has the highest PEA detergent on the market. My 2010 CRV had a pretty stubborn injector. Put this in a empty tank filled up. Let the car get to normal temperature then did 5 wide open throttle pulls. Drove the car normally after that. The. Let it sit for two weeks. Drove perfect after that. Smooth idle and isn't down on power anymore. Being that the PEA content is so high I would only run a full bottle if your car is really gummed up. I haven't tested half a bottle yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I used this because of the rating on Amazon & my mechanic recommended this. I was using on a 2001 Toyota Camry V6 with 160K miles. I also used really good gas in this car. I noticed a difference immediately. Over all I would definitely use this again, but I don't have the car any longer. This is based on the condition of the car and how well I've maintained this vehicle. While others my not have the same experience, I would consider several variables when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I like it...but not sure how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this to clean any carbon deposits on the plugs before I swapped them on my 2006 f150 5.4L 3V. They are notorious for breaking plugs, and fortunately I didn't break any...again not sure how much this helped but it gave me peace of mind, plus I have more confidence in this brand than the others.
customer_reviews.author: yeastguru

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertsed
customer_reviews.text: This is another outstanding redline product. Works better than techron. I use it every 3000-5000 to clean my fuel injectors on my BMW M3. It really does restore power and throttle response. My car seems to be sensitive to the alcohol they put in the gas now days. My only complaint is the bottle neck is too small to open my flapper valve on my gas tank so I need to use a funnel
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Red line is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Maintenance is a very important part of the longevity of your vehicle. Oil is what everyone makes a fuss about. But your fuel delivery system is almost equally important. If your car is a piece of poop, then look in the mirror. You may or may not need a funnel to get this in the gas tank nozzle. Or try removing a gas can spout, stick it in the tank then add the Red Line thet way just to open the flap. Take care of your vehicle and it will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Alsby

customer_reviews.title: MPG improved in a 3 year old vehicle with 30,000 miles
customer_reviews.text: My MPG increased by about 4 MPG after using the product. I'm very happy at how well it worked considering my vehicle is rather new and I buy Top Tier gas as much as possible. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Improved gas mileage about 2 mpg
customer_reviews.text: Keeps fuel system like new. If you have a car with direct injection, you must use this. Direct injection engines have problems with carbon build up. This is worth the price for that alone, then add the gas mileage savings too!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick 1

customer_reviews.title: Really Cleans Your Auto Fuel System
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Redline Fuel System Cleaner for years and it never disappoints. If one of my cars begins to have a slightly rough idle, I fill the tank and pour in a bottle of this stuff. Unless there is a mechanical problem, such as worn out spark plugs, by the time the tank is down to one quarter, the idle is again smooth. I would rate this 5 stars, except the cap to one of the bottles I received was loose in the box. Now nothing spilled because each bottle is also sealed beneath the cap, but the cap should never have come off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No perceived benefit
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this several times on a 17 year old Honda Odyssey minivan with 160K miles. Not sure what, if any difference it's made. Certainly mileage isn't better, its not idling any better, nor has there been any perceived impact on low range acceleration. I think you're better off just getting Top Tier gas instead which is available everywhere... also, the V6 on this van is bullet proof so maybe if you have another engine it might work better...
customer_reviews.author: Darren MacAlester

customer_reviews.title: Noticable Difference gas mileage and performance
customer_reviews.text: I had a noticable diifference in gas mileage and performance in city driving after finishing the first tankful. I have used Lucas, Royal Purple, and Mix-I-go with no noticable improvement, but this Red Line stuff works. I will add the 2nd bottle to the gas tank after my next oil change.
customer_reviews.author: MiDAT

customer_reviews.title: 20 year automotive tech.
customer_reviews.text: Works for my engine builders, works for me. I don’t use this to “fix” problems. But I do use it for maintenance on all my vehicles. Gas mileage going down? Use this! If you’re using STP or LUCAS or any other brand, you are wasting your money. This packs punch!
customer_reviews.author: Kells.

customer_reviews.title: Works great when its in your system.
customer_reviews.text: Works great when you put in the tank. Still feel the affects after 2-3 tanks later in terms of MPG and slighter higher acceleration. I use this after every 2,000-5,000 miles. I really don't know if its cleaning the system or not as I don't know how to even check for it. But it definitely does something when you put in the tank and MPGs lasts at least at least another few tanks. (18 gal for me)
customer_reviews.author: Sumit K. Sinha

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the pick up in the car when I drove after adding Redline. You can't go wrong with Redline. My engine has 78,000 miles so it was time to use something and I chose Redline for the PEA. Really did work. My car is driving nice and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence. It ACTUALLY works.
customer_reviews.text: The single most potent fuel system additive that I've ever used. It produces objective results every time I use it in my wife's car. I never tell her that I've added it and she goes to the same gas station every time. Without fail, she notes that the engine runs smoother, idles smoother, and seems to have more power every single time I add this. She makes none of those unsolicited observations when I do not. This likely has to do with it having one of the highest doses of PEA (the actual active cleaning additive) available on the market today. I have tried every single major brand except for BG 44K.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Check Engine Light for Catalytic Converter Code Disappeared
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product based on reviews I read during my research. I can vouch for this Cleaner as the engine light went out and my vehicle passed the emissions inspection that is required in our county. I used it as directed and after approximately 50 miles the engine light went out. Took it in for vehicle inspection the next day and passed. Saved me major dollars to replace catalytic converter out of warranty. Would use this again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Check Engine Light!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a used truck with 125,000 miles, I was getting a check engine light. I was getting an error code for O2 sensors. I changed spark plugs and O2 sensors (which needed to be done anyway), but would the code would still come and go with every tank of gas. Also tried some of the cheaper fuel additives with no results. I read where that code could also be caused by dirty fuel injectors. After adding the Red Line SI-1, I have gone 3 months now with no problems AND getting better gas mileage. Highly recommend giving this a try!
customer_reviews.author: SteveW

customer_reviews.title: A clean engine is a happy engine
customer_reviews.text: These is the best fuel treatment product I have every found. It has the highest concentration of PEA (PolyEther Amine) of all the products out there (same stuff is in Chevron Techron, but much lower concentration). Great bang for your buck. I throw one in the gas tank at each oil change (5,000m miles).
customer_reviews.author: UCrazyKid

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do with solid ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do with solid levels of (expensive) PEA in the formula. The added benefit of some top lubrication to deal with clean up bits is a plus. Would give it five stars but it is a bit spendy. Products from 3M (hard to find) and Techron contain less of this potent yet gentle cleaner. Note that the "Complete..." version is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: 2015-2019 F150
customer_reviews.text: To the people giving this stuff a bad review because the bottle doesn't work on the new F150 cap design need to read their owner's manual. If you pull the back seat down there is a funnel that ford provides you for these situations. Of course this is on a Screw models but all body types have the same funnel provided. As for the product I have used it in a few different vehicle's and it works rather well. Never had an issue with it. I currently have a 2016 F150 and plan on using it for the life or time that I own it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good so far! My CRV experienced an increase of 2mpg after running through a whole tank. Stock, Honda advertises the 2011 model achieving 28mpg. Well, after over 100k my CRV was running 21-22mpg. Afer using this I'm running 23-25mpg. Of course, this is my own experience. But I encourage others to try this out! I'm definitely going to be using this everytime I replace my oil.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Helped with sticky fuel sending unit; 2002 Honda Civic
customer_reviews.text: My 2002 Honda Civic's fuel gauge was sticky, it would stay at Full forever, and then drop to half a gallon and empty in an instant. On forums, the issue was attributed to the fuel sending unit and instead of trying to replace that, I also read these types of products help and after 5,000 miles, it seems to have helped. I was hoping to also see a benefit in mileage, but I haven't really seen any. I plan to use this again.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: None better!
customer_reviews.text: I got Red Line Additive at the recommendation of many many people on an online forum dedicated to my car model & year, because it's a 4 cylinder car with turbo charger, and let me tell you they weren't wrong. Literally from the first application I noticed my car runs smoother and peppier. Very happy with this product & will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: One of those things you do because you think you should...
customer_reviews.text: My Jeep Patriot has a 13gal tank so, as the 15oz bottle is intended to treat 20gal, I pour 7.5oz every 3K-4K miles... Vehicle has 35K on her and she runs smooth... Don't know that the Redline is doing anything significant to keep the engine purring - but then, don't know that it isn't another reason the motor purrs (along with regular oil changes) ... Will keep adding it and feeling that I'm doing a little bit extra to maintain the engine...
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Cantu

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't trust any other name in automotive additives or high performance products than Redline!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, wouldn't trust any other name in automotive additives or high performance products than Redline!!! I race cars and the only products I will put in my expensive equipment is Redline, you can't beat the performance wrapped around that logo.
customer_reviews.author: synthetic

customer_reviews.title: Helped Solve an Issue with My 2006 Suzuki Boulevard M50
customer_reviews.text: I was having an issue with my fuel-injected 2006 Suzuki Boulevard M50 where it kept dying out shortly after I started out riding. The issue persisted after I changed air filter, spark plugs, etc. Don't know if I got some bad fuel or what. I put this in along with some new gasoline and the issues stopped immediately. Guess it did what I needed it to!
customer_reviews.author: kerry914

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good deep cleaning solution for my truck. I bought this based on good reviews and it did not disappoint. I replaced some ad plugs and wires and needed a solution to help clean the combustion chamber after miles of poor running. Red line did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: ScooterTim

customer_reviews.title: Raised Idling +200RPM
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2004 Rav4 with 150K miles and noticed at idle in gear the engine was idling around 550rpm and a little rough. I added this and noticed the RPM is now up around 750, and its idling considerably smoother. I can't say enough about how this has improved the idling. As far as gas mileage, I don't really keep track.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rycraft

customer_reviews.title: ... this on our 1983 Mercedes 380SL that had a bad miss. It would fumble at jerk the car ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on our 1983 Mercedes 380SL that had a bad miss. It would fumble at jerk the car at stoplights. After literally 20 minutes of mixing this with full tank the miss is completely gone and the car idles very smoothly. I plan on using it again in the future. Maybe 2-3 times a year for a normal driver. Not sure if its a good idea to use it too often as it does contain some solvents.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Increased mileage noticeably. Used in a 2012 Camry 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Increased mileage noticeably. Used in a 2012 Camry 4 cylinder and it runs stronger and cleaner. Dealer wanted over $200 to clean the injectors; I did it for under $15!
customer_reviews.author: 1 Old Chief

customer_reviews.title: The challenge with this type of product is being able ...
customer_reviews.text: The challenge with this type of product is being able to assess improvement with indirect measurement. I used 2 bottles in a 36 gallon gas tank and ran down to nearly empty. My fuel mileage improved when pulling my loaded trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on a F150
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle is too short to empty contents in my gas tank (2016 F150) and half of the fluid spilled on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great additive
customer_reviews.text: New or old i use this a couple of times a year in each of my vehicles. Keeps things clean and running well between regular maintenance intervals.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I drive a 2015 Lexus LS460. For few months ...
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2015 Lexus LS460. For few months I have noticed that it drive a bit sluggish. I used this product hoping to see a major improvement based on the reviews I read, but I have not. I see a bit of improvement, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: tony farahani

customer_reviews.title: Good  product
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. I waited until my car was almost empty when I put it in. I have a Lexus RX350 and drove it on the long trip to out of town. The car ran smoothly as usual but seem to have a little bit more peppy on the throttle response. I will continue to use this product off and on basis.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, 2010 acura rl with 106k. I noticed a difference in 5 miles so much smoother and restored power! At half a tank gone now it is like a new car again. Will buy for my other car and this car again well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Runningman7

customer_reviews.title: This is an effective product.
customer_reviews.text: I've use this product at a low level, continuously, for about 25 years. Never any issues. Had an intake manifold off recently, valves perfectly clean at 300K miles.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Redline makes great products for your car and this is the best fuel system cleaner you can buy. Better gas mileage, more engine pep, and your entire fuel system will benefit. Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product, definitely works
customer_reviews.text: My car was jerking and not running her best so I put the recommended amount in the gas tank and it worked like a charm, hasn't ran bad since!
customer_reviews.author: AndyBlair

customer_reviews.title: Unscrewed cap on bottle
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered with loosely screwed cap, which meant that there was leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Lower cost than other options.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used BG 44K for years to periodically clean the fuel systems on our cars. My old Subaru had been getting as low as 18 mpg. One bottle brought me to 24. O change in driving, weather or other variables. Not absolute proof but I’m convinced
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2008 hummer h3 that would spit and sputter when u first started it.bought this and put in with full tank of gas. Rough idle has completely disappeared. I couldn't be happier.will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: brian69

customer_reviews.title: Best On Market
customer_reviews.text: If you read the reviews by people with much more automotive knowledge than I, you will find that this product has the highest concentration of the best cleaning agent for gasoline fuel systems. I have used this on several cars with stumbling, poor performance, etc., and have always had satisfactory results. I generally buy by the case.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Mark

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help my situation
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance to see if it would clean my oxygen sensors which cut on the check engine warning light in my 2005 Tundra. In my case total waste of money. Didn’t make any difference, light still comes on. I gambled that it would help and it didn’t. Not saying you would have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, What a Difference!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this makes. I put a bottle in my BMW e39 that was running a little ruff. After about a week now smooth as silk. My thought was the injectors were a bit dirty. More power too! Definitely will purchase again in 3,000 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The best way I can describe to you what kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but after doing some of my homework and also asking my mechanic and getting his approval, I went ahead and emptied one in my tank. I definitely feel a difference. My car runs more smooth, acceleration has improved, and the slight vibration is gone. I don't, however, notice any MPG improvement. The best way I can describe to you what kind of a difference this makes would pretty much be the way your car runs right after you change the air filter. I think it's money well spent, especially if you have never used a fuel injector cleaner before.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fuel additive
customer_reviews.text: I use this fuel additive in my cars and motorcycle every 3 to 5k miles. Does an excellent job keeping the top-end cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: CraigB

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my Valkyrie fuel system
customer_reviews.text: My bike has 6 carburators and this saved me taking them apart. Two tank fulls and my Valkyrie is back to running smooth.
customer_reviews.author: halti

customer_reviews.title: Only Halfway through the bottle and definitely works.
customer_reviews.text: Gave mileage 3 stars cause I’m not very sure it helped. It probabaly did. Although I’m halfway through the tank of gas with this, and I noticed it’s MUCH easier to start. Smoother acceleration, smooth idle. Put this in a neglected 1996 tahoe with 5.7 vortec motor at 146k miles. Also used in a 2001 p71 with 171k miles.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't  like the performance  with one bottle. May be needed more than one bottle but costly
customer_reviews.text: Too much costly. Compare didn't look nothing got updated. May be needed another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shafaat

customer_reviews.title: perhaps it was a good idea, or maybe you just had good genes
customer_reviews.text: My rating is based more or less on faith. I used Amsoil PI for years, but it became too pricey and the Red Line product is reasonably similar. I have never had an injector failure, so maybe these chemicals do work. The point is, unless you are going to periodically dissect your engine, it is really difficult to establish the effectiveness. If you get to 300K miles, maybe it helped or maybe the engine was built on a Wednesday. If you take vitamins and live to be a hundred, perhaps it was a good idea, or maybe you just had good genes.
customer_reviews.author: Alson G. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fuel additive made. I use this in all my vehicles with over 80000 miles, lawnmowers, snowblowers, chainsaws, weed eaters and boats. Anything with a motor. My Dodge Ram had a check engine light for a bad CO2 Sensor, ran this through it and the light went out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 stroke oil I will use
customer_reviews.text: Vest period, been usimg it on every bike I have had for years, sometimes when i go to change a top end I am amazed that it didnt even need it. Keeps engine clean, lubed and zinging for the long hual. Will never use anything else
customer_reviews.author: Hooligun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this fuel system cleaner for many years on both my car and motorcycles. It really works, even cleaning some injectors that the mechanic stated would never fully perform (after several weeks of use the mechanic thought I had installed new injectors). Can be used repeatedly with no damage to the fuel system (unlike other cleaners).
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Best fuel injector cleaner on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fuel injector cleaner on the market. I've used other ones to either no avail or they would cause my car to misfire a bit. Redline hit the perfect balance between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect too much.
customer_reviews.text: My car is 2000 model and recently has some issues. And when I read the error code, it was indirectly related to fuel system. So, I bought this. But, it wasn't that helpful. Of course, I think I was expecting too much. Maybe it worths as its price.
customer_reviews.author: Youngjae lee

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great!
customer_reviews.text: My gas pickup died while idling through a grocery store parking lot. I applied one bottle of this product to the tank which I had just filled and drove normally for the next week or two and all issues appeared to vanish.
customer_reviews.author: It's Chuck Norse

customer_reviews.title: Works Great you will never regret
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Fuel System Cleaner I ever used I decided to sell my Nissan Maxima. I am not going to sell it anymore my car run like a Horse. I recommended to any one I will but it again Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Did what it was supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my motorcycle carbs, in place. Saved me hours of work and aggravation. Filled up the tank and added some more cleaner. 10 miles later, the bike runs great. I'm gonna use this product in both of the cars now. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the additive my 2014 grand Cherokee likes the most to keep running smoothly. I also tried seafoam, which was suggested by my dealer— but didn’t work imo.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help pass emissions.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to keep engine off. I’ve reset the light at least 20 times and 10 minutes later it’s back on.
customer_reviews.author: J. yoder

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years
customer_reviews.text: I use a full bottle of this in a full tank of gas at each oil change. I have been using this product for decades and have never had to worry about clogged injectors, etc. Keeps fuel system very clean.
customer_reviews.author: jimfrompa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Better.
customer_reviews.text: Your Engine on Steroids. ...And Sugar. ...And a B12 Shot. ...And an Energy Drink. ...And Caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Back to normal
customer_reviews.text: Was having a weird idle, and this helped smooth it out instantly. I used Redline products before and they worked amazing so I gave this a shot and happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Nirav

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product did improve my gas mileage by about 10% but did nothing to eliminate my Check Engine light being on. Using this to pass an emissions test may be folly. Don't believe the hype & claims
customer_reviews.author: wzm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: After putting this product in my gas tank, I expected miracles. I drove and drove, never seeing a difference. I was pretty convinced this didn’t do much since all performance of my car was the same... BUT after finally using up the whole full tank, my car was running so smooth! Clean, powerful startup, louder exhaust, better mileage, even easier handling! My mom even noticed a difference. Definitely worth the try, just give it time to work!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Glad this worked I had gunk in the tank and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had fuel tank problems. Glad this worked I had gunk in the tank and didn't want to have to drop and flush it. Took about a week to work. Have not had any problems in the last 9 consecutive days. Will keep adding every oil change for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Quade

customer_reviews.title: I feel the clean..
customer_reviews.text: Used and noticed fuel mileage increase, wish redline would partner with fuel companys and rock the gasoline world because im weary of various gas stations. Good product, i also use their gear oil in my trans.
customer_reviews.author: bro from arizona, bro

customer_reviews.title: Increased Power
customer_reviews.text: I seemed to have a little more power using this just once. I have a 1997 Ford Explorer with a V8. It has 165,000 miles on it and I decided to use a fuel system cleaner for the first time. I believe it must have cleaned my injectors, as I've just changed the spark plugs at 150,000 miles. I filled the vehicle up and used the whole bottle. I've burned through a couple tanks of gas since then, and the increased power is still there. There must be something to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Christlieb

customer_reviews.title: It's Always Working
customer_reviews.text: Whether idling or on the road it does the job. Cleaned up an engine after some bad fuel that was purchased in a pinch at an off brand fuel store. Running fine now. Used entire bottle to clear up as idle was rough when cold due to the bad batch of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Logistics Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the best on the market and I have to agree. My truck has never been smoother
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Hope it worked!
customer_reviews.text: This could literally be Kool aid and I wouldn't know any better. But I put it in my tank and it didn't blow up, so I guess it worked lol
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Buy the bulk box
customer_reviews.text: I use these as they have the highest detergent level you can find. Have always gained a few mpg after use. Buying the bulk box is a much better value than one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Best fuel injector cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: Redline is the best damn injector cleaner out there. I put it in a 2001 Mustang. The Mustang idled horrible and sputtered when accelerating. After about 30 miles of driving, the idle improved and so did the sputtering. It took about 200 odd miles to run out the tank and now the car now idles at around 900-1000 and accelerates without issue. I'm going to put in a bottle every 6 months to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The best fuel additive
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best fuel injector cleaner on the market. Quicker acceleration noticed after 1/2 tank is used. Vehicle no longer “sluggish”.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: One bottle came with the red plastic cap missing. The seal prevented very little of the cleaner from oozing out, but the corner of the box is completely saturated with oil. Not a good way to have confidence in the product.
customer_reviews.author: StPetePat

customer_reviews.title: Tune up in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I put some old 2 stroke fuel in my blower and it started running bad. I put a splash of this in the tank and fired it back up, man it came alive. Blower runs great even on the tank of old fuel. Just put a bottle in my boat to see if it fixes my slight miss. Im sure it will, great product.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: It’s really work
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my 2015 Passat 1,8 tsi 56K mile car is now more smooth,silent and has better acceleration...
customer_reviews.author: Halil

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Goof stuff. I noticed a small increase in power and gas mileage in both my 1998 4-runner and my mom's 2002 Buick. I also added an ounce to all my gas powered 2-stroke yard equipment and all I can say is WOW! They had so much more power and easier to start
customer_reviews.author: brenda Wright

customer_reviews.title: By far the best cleaner it worth it if your car has issues with cat
customer_reviews.text: By far the best cat cleaner way better than Cataclean, it didn't improved my mileage but allowed me to get my car passed emissions test
customer_reviews.author: C. Deras

product_meta.title: Red Line (60103) Complete SI-1 Fuel System Cleaner - Gas and Injector Additive Treatment - 15 Oz Bottle
product_meta.description: Size:15 OunceFUEL ADDITIVES: All Red Line fuel additives are comprised of the best chemistry for cleaning and preventing corrosion in fuel systems. They are designed to significantly improve performance and exceed expectations. SINCE 1979 In 1979, Red Line Synthetic Oil began creating lubricants for the racing industry. Today, we manufacture more than 100 quality products, including motor oils, gear oils, assembly lubes, fuel additives and our popular Water Wetter cooling additive for the automotive, motorcycle, marine and industrial markets. TECHNOLOGY Using cutting edge technology, Red Line responds to the technical challenges of today’s performance industry. We are enthusiasts that stay on top of each market niche, ensuring product recommendations that result in serious performance gains. We use this knowledge of racing to create high-performance products for track cars and street vehicles. Red Line products perform and protect better than any on the market. No compromises.
feature_bullets: Designed to exceed expectations - Red line complete SI-1 fuel system cleaner treatment for cleaning & preventing corrosion in fuel systems
Perform & protect - Fuel additive cleans injectors, carburetors, valve & combustion chamber deposits with a powerful concentrated blend of high-temp and low-temp detergents
Efficient fuel burn - Gas treatment that enhances gasoline stability, while reducing the buildup of gum and varnish formation
Easy to use - Use one bottle per tank for most effective treatment, additive cleans nearly 100% efficiency in one treatment
Why red line - Established in 1979, red line products perform & protect better than any on the market. No compromises
